程序包 org.diku.dms.bds_project

类 Edge<ED>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diku.dms.bds_project.Edge<ED>
  • 类型参数:
    ED - edge attribute data type
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Edge<ED>>
    直接已知子类:
    EdgeTriplet
    public class Edge<ED>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Edge<ED>>, java.io.Serializable
    An edge consists of the id of source vertex, the id of destination vertex and the attribute on the edge.

        public Edge​(VertexId srcId,
            VertexId dstId,
            ED attr)
        Constructor method of Edge.
        参数:
        srcId - the vertex id of the source vertex
        dstId - the vertex id of the destination vertex
        attr - the attribute associated with the edge

    • 方法详细资料

      • otherVertexId

        public VertexId otherVertexId​(VertexId vid)
        Given one vertex in the edge return the other vertex.
        参数:
        vid - the id one of two vertices on the edge.
        返回:
        the id of the other vertex on the edge.

      • relativeDirection

        public EdgeDirection relativeDirection​(VertexId vid)
        Return the relative direction of the edge to the corresponding vertex.
        参数:
        vid - the id of one of the two vertices in the edge.
        返回:
        the relative direction of the edge to the corresponding vertex.
